label: recipientParty
comment: A trade party that receives this exchanged document.
A trade related party that receives this referenced document.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.
